biotools.summary: The « Ocean Read Atlas » web service allows to search one or several sequences across all of Tara Oceans metagenomic raw sequencing data using kmindex, a new tool that performs indexing and queries using orders of magnitudes with less resources. It enables the visualization of the results on a geographic map and their correlation with each of the 56 environmental variables collected during the circumnavigation campaign. This server enables to perform instant searches on a large and complex dataset, providing new perspectives on the deep exploitation of Tara Oceans resources.
